release.action: Migrating the connector to opensource model.

ul.li: Added 'root-xpath' parameter to StandardRequestHandler and StandardResponseHandler

Added 'remove-namespaces' parameter to StandardRequestHandler and StandardResponseHandler. This is used to remove namespace declarations from request and response XML. If value * is given, then all namespace declarations are removed:
<remove-namespaces:> <namespace-uri>*</namespace-uri> </remove-namespaces:>
or
<remove-namespaces:> <namespace-uri>uri:namespace1</namespace-uri> <namespace-uri>uri:namespace2</namespace-uri> </remove-namespaces:>

release.action: Added XSDs for the implementation and configuration XML.
Refactored some classes to use interfaces instead of implementation classes
